title: Calories in a Cherry Tomato
meta_description: Discover calories in a cherry tomato, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Average fresh, raw cherry tomato (~17 g), red variety, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged products.

quick_answer.text: One average cherry tomato has about 3 kcal and is low in calories but provides vitamin C.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fresh produce.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cherry tomato?
faqs.a: About 3 kcal for one average-sized cherry tomato.
Yes, one cherry tomato has only 0.7 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cherry tomato?
faqs.a: Very low at 0.1 g per cherry tomato.
A small amount, about 0.2 g per cherry tomato, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in cherry tomatoes?
faqs.a: Smaller ones have fewer calories (2-3 kcal); larger may reach 5 kcal.
